ChildBranches.Name: Don the Bone
ChildBranches.Description: There is a ring of browned bone; put it on.

DefaultEvent.Description: The Matron leads you to one of the many doors. You follow her into the darkness beyond.
DefaultEvent.Name: It fits so well in your hand; it's awkwardly light, however

ChildBranches.Name: Lift the Cup
ChildBranches.Description: Empty, silver, modern. Engraved with a simple floral scroll.

DefaultEvent.Description: The Matron leads you to one of the many doors. You follow her into the darkness beyond.
DefaultEvent.Name: Is the balance ever so slightly off? It winks at you in the light

ChildBranches.Name: Grasp the Knife
ChildBranches.Description: A handle of horn; a polished blade. There are possibilities in so fine an instrument.

Description: Within the Sanctum, where no water drips, are walls, doors and a pedestal of trinkets. It is watched over by a Stony Matron. "Make an offering of scrap, and you may choose."
Name: Knife, Cup, or Bone?
